label: ham
subject: Re: [R] character to time problem
body: 110. This frankincense then is obtained thus by the Arabians; and cassia is obtained as follows:they bind up in cows'-hide and other kinds of skins all their body and their face except only the eyes, and then go to get the cassia. This grows in a pool not very deep, and round the pool and in it lodge, it seems, winged beasts nearly resembling bats, and they squeak horribly and are courageous in fight. These they must keep off from their eyes, and so cut the cassia.
